trans-unit.source: Use the Configurator in Wizard Mode

seg-source.mrk: Use the Configurator in Wizard Mode

target.mrk: Utiliser le configurateur en mode wizard

trans-unit.source: The Wizard mode automatically launches after a server installation or if the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is not configured.

seg-source.mrk: The Wizard mode automatically launches after a server installation or if the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is not configured.

target.mrk: Le mode wizard se lance automatiquement après l'installation du serveur ou si la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> n'est pas configurée.

trans-unit.source: It is necessary to use an internet browser to configure . To configure and activate the deduplication engine, you can enter the path https://hostname:8181 in a browser. hostname corresponds to the server on which the binaries are installed.

seg-source.mrk: It is necessary to use an internet browser to configure <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
To configure and activate the deduplication engine, you can enter the path https://hostname:8181 in a browser.
hostname corresponds to the server on which the binaries are installed.

target.mrk: Il est nécessaire d'utiliser un navigateur Internet pour configurer <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour configurer et activer le moteur de déduplication, vous pouvez saisir le chemin https://hostname:8181 dans un navigateur.
hostname correspond au serveur sur lequel les binaires sont installés.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Select a product to activate

seg-source.mrk: Step 1: Select a product to activate

target.mrk: Étape 1 : Sélectionner un produit à activer

trans-unit.source: In the Volume analysis of the Configurator Wizard, click Next.

seg-source.mrk: In the Volume analysis of the Configurator Wizard, click Next.

target.mrk: Dans l'analyse de volume du wizard, cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Activate one or several of the following products:

seg-source.mrk: Activate one or several of the following products:

target.mrk: Activez un ou plusieurs des produits suivants :

trans-unit.source: HyperStream.

seg-source.mrk: HyperStream.

target.mrk: HyperStream.

trans-unit.source: HVDS.

seg-source.mrk: HVDS.

target.mrk: HVDS.

trans-unit.source: The configured options will be applied to the activated product only.

seg-source.mrk: The configured options will be applied to the activated product only.

target.mrk: Les options configurées seront appliquées uniquement au produit activé.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Define port numbers

seg-source.mrk: Step 2: Define port numbers

target.mrk: Étape 2 : Définir les numéros de port

trans-unit.source: Define a port number for the:

seg-source.mrk: Define a port number for the:

target.mrk: Définissez un numéro de port pour :

trans-unit.source: Deduplication engine : 23232 is the default port.

seg-source.mrk: Deduplication engine : 23232 is the default port.

target.mrk: Le moteur de déduplication : 23232 est le port par défaut.

trans-unit.source: Web administration port: 8181 is the default port.

seg-source.mrk: Web administration port: 8181 is the default port.

target.mrk: Port d'administration Web : 8181 est le port par défaut.

trans-unit.source: To modify these ports in the , go to Settings > Advanced > Configurator > Advanced > Ports.

seg-source.mrk: To modify these ports in the , go to Settings > Advanced > Configurator > Advanced > Ports.

target.mrk: Pour modifier ces ports dans la , allez dans Paramètres > Avancé > Configurateur > Avancé > Ports.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If you selected <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in the product selection, you can enable a dual port to secure communication between the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the port used for data transfer.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) If you selected <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in the product selection, you can enable a dual port to secure communication between the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the port used for data transfer.

target.mrk: (Facultatif) Si vous avez sélectionné <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans la sélection du produit, vous pouvez activer un double port pour sécuriser la communication entre la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et le port utilisé pour le transfert de données.

trans-unit.source: To enable dual ports in the , go to Settings > Advanced > Configurator > Advanced > Ports.

seg-source.mrk: To enable dual ports in the , go to Settings > Advanced > Configurator > Advanced > Ports.

target.mrk: Pour activer les ports doubles dans la , allez dans Paramètres > Avancé > Configurateur > Avancé > Ports.

trans-unit.source: As of version 5.0, uses by default the same communication port (httpd.port=8181) for the and the data transfer. This port is used whether you install a new server or upgrade an existing version. When you configure separate ports for administration and data, the data port is used for backup and restore ( included).

seg-source.mrk: As of version 5.0, uses by default the same communication port (httpd.port=8181) for the
and the data transfer.
This port is used whether you install a new server or upgrade an existing version.

When you configure separate ports for administration and data, the data port is used for <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backup and restore (<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> included).

target.mrk: À partir de la version 5.0, utilise par défaut le même port de communication (httpd.port =8181) pour la
et le transfert de données.
Ce port est utilisé que vous installiez un nouveau serveur ou que vous mettiez à niveau une version existante.

Lorsque vous configurez des ports séparés pour l'administration et les données, le port de données est utilisé pour la sauvegarde <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et la restauration (y compris la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />).

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Select directories for deduplicated data blocks, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server data and agent metadata

seg-source.mrk: Step 3: Select directories for deduplicated data blocks, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server data and agent metadata

target.mrk: Étape 3 : Sélectionner des répertoires pour les blocs de données dédupliqués, les données <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> du serveur et les métadonnées de l'agent

trans-unit.source: Select a database to store the ADE database, index data blocks and its journal on a fast access disk, such as an SSD:

seg-source.mrk: Select a database to store the ADE database, index data blocks and its journal on a fast access disk, such as an SSD:

target.mrk: Sélectionnez une base de données pour stocker la base de données ADE, les blocs de données d'index et son journal sur un disque à accès rapide, tel qu'un SSD :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path.

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin.

trans-unit.source: The database must be installed on a dedicated local disk. For performance reasons, it is recommended that:

seg-source.mrk: The database must be installed on a dedicated local disk.
For performance reasons, it is recommended that:

target.mrk: La base de données doit être installée sur un disque local dédié.
Pour des raisons de performance, il est recommandé que :

trans-unit.source: You use about 100 GB for the size of this directory.

seg-source.mrk: You use about 100 GB for the size of this directory.

target.mrk: Vous utilisez environ 100 Go pour la taille de ce répertoire.

trans-unit.source: You install the database and the data repository on separate disks.

seg-source.mrk: You install the database and the data repository on separate disks.

target.mrk: Vous installez la base de données et l'espace de stockage de données sur des disques séparés.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Select a database to store deduplicated data blocks:

seg-source.mrk: Select a database to store deduplicated data blocks:

target.mrk: Sélectionnez une base de données pour stocker les blocs de données dédupliqués :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path.

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin.

trans-unit.source: This section contains information on the capacity (e.g., GB or TB of free space) and the type of storage (e.g., disk or SSD) for the location where the data will be stored. The storage directories correspond to the paths where the block files are stored.

seg-source.mrk: This section contains information on the capacity (e.g., GB or TB of free space) and the type of storage (e.g., disk or SSD) for the location where the data will be stored.
The storage directories correspond to the paths where the block files are stored.

target.mrk: Cette section contient des informations sur la capacité (par exemple, Go ou To d'espace libre) et le type de stockage (par exemple, disque ou SSD) pour l'emplacement où les données seront stockées.
Les répertoires de stockage correspondent aux chemins où sont stockés les fichiers blocs.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

seg-source.mrk: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

target.mrk: Si vous avez activé HSS ou HVDS, sélectionnez les répertoires de flux dans lesquels les nouveaux flux seront stockés :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path.

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin.

trans-unit.source: If you activated Lina, select a metabase to store metadata for each backed up agent on a fast access disk, such as an SSD:

seg-source.mrk: If you activated Lina, select a metabase to store metadata for each backed up agent on a fast access disk, such as an SSD:

target.mrk: Si vous avez activé Lina, sélectionnez une métabase pour stocker les métadonnées de chaque agent sauvegardé sur un disque à accès rapide, tel qu'un SSD :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path.

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin.

trans-unit.source: One database is created for each backed up agent. For performance reasons, it is recommended that you install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> database and the data repository on separate disks. The storage location of the databases can be added or changed in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, provided the product is enabled. See <MadCap:xref href="Use_Configurator_Lina_Admin_Console.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Use the Configurator in the [%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: One database is created for each backed up agent.

For performance reasons, it is recommended that you install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> database and the data repository on separate disks.

The storage location of the databases can be added or changed in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, provided the product is enabled.

See <MadCap:xref href="Use_Configurator_Lina_Admin_Console.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Use the Configurator in the [%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> for more information.

target.mrk: Une base de données est créée pour chaque agent sauvegardé.

Pour des raisons de performances il est recommandé d'installer la base de données <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et l'espace de stockage de données sur des disques séparés.

L'emplacement du stockage des bases de données peut être ajouté ou modifié dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, à condition que le produit soit activé.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Use_Configurator_Lina_Admin_Console.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Use the Configurator in the [%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

seg-source.mrk: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

target.mrk: Si vous avez activé HSS ou HVDS, sélectionnez les répertoires de flux dans lesquels les nouveaux flux seront stockés :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path.

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path.

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

seg-source.mrk: If you activated HSS or HVDS, select the stream directories where new streams will be stored:

target.mrk: Si vous avez activé HSS ou HVDS, sélectionnez les répertoires de flux dans lesquels les nouveaux flux seront stockés :

trans-unit.source: Select a volume.

seg-source.mrk: Select a volume.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez un volume.

trans-unit.source: Enter a path

seg-source.mrk: Enter a path

target.mrk: Saisissez un chemin

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Finalize the initial configuration

seg-source.mrk: Step 4: Finalize the initial configuration

target.mrk: Étape 4 : Finaliser la configuration initiale

trans-unit.source: In the configuration summary, verify the list of selected repositories and ports.

seg-source.mrk: In the configuration summary, verify the list of selected repositories and ports.

target.mrk: Dans le résumé de la configuration, vérifiez la liste des espaces de stockage et des ports sélectionnés.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Confirm you want to receive update notifications.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Confirm you want to receive update notifications.

target.mrk: (Facultatif) Confirmez que vous souhaitez recevoir des notifications de mise à jour.

trans-unit.source: To disable this option in the , go to Settings > Configurator > Advanced > Notifications for updates.

seg-source.mrk: To disable this option in the , go to Settings > Configurator > Advanced > Notifications for updates.

target.mrk: Pour désactiver cette option dans la , accédez à Paramètres > Configurateur > Avancé > Notifications pour les mises à jour.

trans-unit.source: Click Finish.

seg-source.mrk: Click Finish.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Terminer.

trans-unit.source: A message indicates that some modifications have been made in the section and the ADE/ALN/HSS server needs to be restarted to take the changes into account. You will be redirected to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: A message indicates that some modifications have been made in the section and the ADE/ALN/HSS server needs to be restarted to take the changes into account.

You will be redirected to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Un message indique que certaines modifications ont été apportées dans la section et que le serveur ADE/ALN/HSS doit être redémarré pour prendre en compte les modifications.

Vous serez redirigé vers la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="HSS.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
